p: Data preparation was conducted using SPSS version 25.0 (SPSS INC., 2013), and MLMs were performed using program R ( R Cote Team, 2017). A total of 14,375 ESRs were completed during the data collection period. This comprised 4,923 reports during the baseline period, 5,034 reports during the bushfires period, and 4,418 reports during the COVID-19 period. The mean number of reports completed by each participant was 18.67 surveys ( SD = 30.87, range = 4â€“357). Likelihood ratio tests for individual outcomes revealed significant improvements in model fit for random-intercept only models over intercept-only models ( p < 0.0001 for all outcomes), confirming suitability of MLMs for each ESR item.
